/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the typical urban landscape of Beijing.
